DOC.brief_summary: A randomize control trial examine effect exercise base injury prevention programme postural control jump land mechanic . Randomization 4 team , 2 Gaelic football 2 hurl team exercise intervention control group . Participants test use Y Balance test Landing Error Scoring System ( LESS ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Exercise Programme Neuromuscular Outcomes Gaelic Sport
DOC.detailed_description: Gaelic football hurling , stick ball game , Irish amateur game component explosiveness multi-directional nature game , addition overhead activity high level contact involve ; make high risk injury , especially match-play . Recent systematic review find injury prevention exercise program significantly reduce relative risk lower extremity injury . Several study successfully incorporate exercise component include balance , plyometrics , strength , neuromuscular training , run cut movement pattern prevent injury sport soccer , basketball , handball . This study examine effect injury prevention programme 2 recognize risk factor low limb injury balance jump land mechanic .
DOC.criteria: Participants register Collegiate Gaelic football hurling team , train least twice per week . To age 18 year No current injury Injuries low limb prevent train complete test
